original_text: David said, ‘24,000 of these Levite men must have authority for the work of the Lord's temple. 6,000 of them will be officers and judges. 5 4,000 of them will be guards at the gates of the temple. 4,000 of them will use music to praise the Lord. They will use the musical instruments that I have provided for them.’
korean_text: 그 중의 이만 사천 명은 여호와의 성전의 일을 보살피는 자요 육천 명은 관원과 재판관이요

sentences.original_text: must have authority for the work of the Lord's temple
sentences.korean_translation: 주의 성전 일에 대한 권위를 가져야 합니다

sentences.original_text: 6,000 of them will be officers and judges
sentences.korean_translation: 그 중 6,000명은 장관과 재판관이 될 것입니다

sentences.original_text: at the gates of the temple
They will use the musical instruments
that I have provided for them
